quest.name: Harder than Rock
journal: Guildmaster Hamon wishes you to learn the basics of combinations.
To get you warmed up for the lesson, Hamon bids you run and pick up the gil that he has scattered across the city. By sprinting as often as possible, you will be able complete the task more swiftly.
You have gathered all the gil. Report back to Hamon at the Pugilists' Guild.

Hamon is excessively pleased for someone who is getting his own money back. Satisfied that you are warmed up, he next bids you make your way to Scorpion Crossing in western Thanalan. Once there, seek out the four trial stones situated nearby, and deal each of them a Bootshine combo. The impact will draw out earth sprites, which you are required to defeat.
You have succeeded in slaying all the earth sprites. Report your success to Hamon at the Pugilists' Guild.

Having praised your performance in the trial, Hamon introduces you to Chuchuto, his assistant and first student. The two of them believe that you have great promise. Train hard, that you might live up to their expectations.

※The next pugilist quest will be available from Hamon upon reaching level 10.
objectives: Use Bootshine on the trial stones, and defeat the earth sprites.
Report to Hamon at the Pugilists' Guild.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: You've been training hard, Forename. Aye, I can tell by the lightness of your steps and the strength in your fists. I reckon you're ready for your next lesson.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: But before we begin, some warming up's in order. For this, I've scattered some gil across Ul'dah. I want you to run around the city and pick it all up.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Now, that's my money lying out there, so I want you to go about it like there's an Amalj'aa war band on your heels. In other words, I want you to sprint.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Of course, you can't go on sprinting indefinitely─your body needs to rest awhile after each burst of speed. This may sound elementary, but I'm telling you this to demonstrate a point.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: As a pugilist, it's essential that you learn to pace yourself in a fight, else you're liable to get worn out. And when that happens, the fight's as good as over, and you'd be sorry if you had bet on yourself.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: That's my money lying out there, lassson. I'd thank you to hurry and pick it all up before some vulture swoops on it.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: ...Five hundred gil!? Crikey, this is good for a week's worth of─

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: ...Ahem. I mean, well done, Forename. Now that you're all warmed up, we can see to your lesson─a trial, to be precise.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Take yourself to Scorpion Crossing in western Thanalan. There you'll find four large stones─the “trial stones,” they're called. I want you to deal each of these stones a solid Bootshine combo.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: The impact will arouse the earth sprites that sleep within, which you must then defeat. If you find yourself hard-pressed, there's no shame in running away. You're still learning the ropes, after all.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Once you've gotten your wind back, you can hurl yourself into the fray again. And remember this: strikes bring down opponents, but it's your footwork that keeps you standing. Now, off you go, Forename, and good luck!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Use Bootshine on the trial stones, and defeat the earth sprites that appear.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: So you've given the earth sprites what for? Well done, Forename! By smiting stone and earth, you've forged unyielding weapons of your fists!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: You're a nigh-endless fount of vigor, Forename. Aye, just like myself in my younger days.

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: This must be the promising recruit you've been telling me about!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Well, of course shehe's promising─shehe's training under Hamooon HOLYFIIIST!

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: Hehe, that's our Master Hamon!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Forename, I don't believe I've introduced my assistant yet. This is Chuchuto.

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: A pleasure to make your acquaintance! As introduced, I serve as Master Hamon's right hand, though there's still much and more I have yet to learn. Together, let us strive for mastery of our art!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Chuchuto joined the guild soon after I was made its master. She's my very first student, as a matter of fact. Well, there was one other, to be sure, but...

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: Let's not dwell on the past, Master. It was Forename's bright future we were discussing.

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: Which reminds me, did you collect my gil from herhim? My gear is rather worn down, and I do need the money for repairs...

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: <sputter> A-Ahem! Yes, Forename's future with us is bright indeed!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: If shehe keeps up herhis efforts, shehe may well become the next Holyfist!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Train hard, young one, and grow strong. When the time's ripe, I'll have another little lesson for you. Hah hah hah!

dialogue.name: POP
dialogue.text: You sense a hostile presence!
